Financial risk management

The Group has exposure to the following risks from its use of financial instruments: . Credit risk

Credit risk

Credit risk is the risk of a financial loss to the Group if a customer or counterparty to a financial instrument fails to meet its contractual obligations.

The Group’s primaw exposure to credit risk, arises through its trade receivables. Concentration of the credit risk relating to these receivables are limited and the Group's historical experience of collection of these receivables falls within the allowances recognised. Due to these factors, the Group believes that no additional credit risks beyond amounts provided for collection losses is inherent in the Group’s trade receivables.

The Company does not have any signiﬁcant exposure to credit risk,
